content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/tiangolo/fastapi.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use a base image with Python
FROM python:3.9-slim

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install the requirements
RUN pip install .[all] \
    && pip install -r requirements-tests.txt

# Run the test suite to verify everything is set up correctly
RUN pytest
